docs.text: Documentation : https://docs.pyscript.net/latest/ Source Code : https://github.com/pyscript/pyscript Exemples : https://pyscript.net/examples/ Introduction PyScript is a framework that allows users to create rich Python applications in the browser using HTML's interface and the power of Pyodide, WASM, and modern web technologies. Run Building the Docker image docker build --tag nginx/dev --file Dockerfile.nginx .
